brief_title: Journey Begins - Arrival in the Golden City
description: Cross the Atlantic and land in San Francisco, settling into the charming Duboce Park neighborhood while exploring iconic Painted Ladies and City Hall.

brief_title: Alcatraz Island and Fisherman's Wharf Adventure
description: Early morning ferry to the infamous prison island, followed by classic SF experiences including sea lions, sourdough bowls, and cable car rides.

brief_title: Golden Gate Bridge and Mission District
description: Iconic bridge walks with stunning bay views, optional Sausalito ferry, and evening exploration of vibrant Mission District culture.

brief_title: Golden Gate Park and Twin Peaks Views
description: Peaceful Japanese Tea Garden visit and panoramic city views from the observation tower and Twin Peaks summit.
Morning departure from San Francisco, afternoon arrival in Waikiki, first Hawaiian sunset and beach exploration.
Lush rainforest sanctuary exploration and challenging coastal hike with spectacular Mokulua Islands views.
Early morning Diamond Head crater climb followed by thrilling doors-off helicopter tour over Oahu's stunning landscapes.
Full-day adventure at Kualoa Ranch with movie site tours, UTV driving, and catamaran cruise along the windward coast.
Historic downtown Honolulu exploration with royal palace tour and King Kamehameha statue, plus relaxing Waikiki afternoon.

brief_title: Rainforest Waterfall and Farewell Beach Day
description: Final nature adventure through bamboo forests to Manoa Falls, followed by last moments in Waikiki paradise.

brief_title: Island Paradise to City of Angels
description: Departure from Hawaii with arrival in Los Angeles, settling into Mid-City neighborhood for final leg of adventure.

brief_title: Beverly Hills Glamour and Hollywood Icons
description: Luxury shopping on Rodeo Drive, celebrity star hunting on Hollywood Walk of Fame, and sunset views from Griffith Observatory.
Classic California beach day from Santa Monica Pier's rides to Venice Beach's eclectic boardwalk and street performers.
Full day immersion in working movie studio with behind-the-scenes tours, Harry Potter wizardry, and Nintendo world adventures.
Last morning in Los Angeles with packing and souvenir gathering before beginning the long journey home to Romania.
